channel.title: NPC Stops Moving! [Dementhium 637/9]
channel.description:
Okay guys, so I am having some troubles. Everytime i finish speaking with an NPC they stop moving around and look at you while you move and have the follow animation. Same goes for summoning, when you summon the familiar he just stands there and does not move around.
Anyone know why this is happening?

item.title: NPC Stops Moving! [Dementhium 637/9]
item.dc:creator: @Divini Divini
item.description:
@Divini wrote:

Okay guys, so I am having some troubles. Everytime i finish speaking with an NPC they stop moving around and look at you while you move and have the follow animation. Same goes for summoning, when you summon the familiar he just stands there and does not move around.

Anyone know why this is happening?
